data.title: Current local time in Pula. What time is now in Pula
data.meta_description: Current local time and date in Pula, Croatia right now. View exact time, timezone and time change dates.
data.text:
March 31 2024 — Daylight Saving TimeStart

Sunday, March 31 2024, 02:00 clocks were turned forward 1 hour to

Sunday, March 31 2024, 03:00 local daylight time instead

Time zone: CET → CEST

October 27 2024 — Daylight Saving TimeEnd

Sunday, October 27 2024, 03:00 clocks were turned backward 1 hour to

Sunday, October 27 2024, 02:00 local daylight time instead

Time zone: CEST → CET
